G18Snippet:
Variable optionnelle. <var name="$var$" optional="1" label="$lbl$"></var> $end$
Variable obligatoire. <var name="$var$" optional="0" label="$lbl$"></var> $end$
Create an empty plantUML diagram @startuml header <font color=red>General diagram :</font> [Ref] $ref$ endheader title $title$ center footer $footer$
$end$
@enduml
A Simple puml UseCase @startuml header <font color=red>Use Case:</font> [Ref] $ref$ endheader center footer $footer$ title $title$
:$mainActor$: as $mainActorPseudo$
($UCDesc$) as $UC$ $mainActorPseudo$ --> $UC$ : $RelDesc$
$end$
@enduml
Create a new sequence diagram with autoinc/ @startuml header <font color=red>Sequence diagram :</font> [Ref] $ref$ endheader center footer $footer$ title $title$
== INIT == autonumber 10 10 "<b>($msgprefix$0)"
$end$
@enduml
Create a new sequence diagram with autoinc/ @startuml header <font color=red>Sequence diagram :</font> [Ref] $ref$ endheader center footer $footer$ title $title$
== INIT ==
$end$ @enduml
New Class Diagram @startuml header <font color=red>Class diagram :</font> [Ref] $ref$ endheader center footer $footer$ title $title$
$end$ @enduml
New Maquette @startuml header <font color=red>Deployement diagram :</font> [Ref] $ref$ endheader center footer $footer$ title $title$ !definelong MAQ(x,t) "<< ##t >> {{ salt _##x }} " as x !enddefinelong
$end$ @enduml
New Class Diagram @startuml header <font color=red>Deployement diagram :</font> [Ref] $ref$ endheader center footer $footer$ title $title$
$end$ @enduml
New Class Diagram @startuml header <font color=red>Activity diagram :</font> [Ref] $ref$ endheader center footer $footer$ title $title$
$end$ @enduml
Gantt @startgantt project starts the $yy$/$mm$/$dd$ $end$ @endgantt
Dark theme handwritten skinparam handwritten true skinparam defaultFontColor #FFFFFF skinparam BackgroundColor black skinparam bordercolor white skinparam ArrowColor LightGreen
skinparam usecase { BackgroundColor black bordercolor white ArrowColor LightGreen BackgroundColor<< StandardUseCase >> #0040A0 } skinparam actor { BackgroundColor black bordercolor Red ArrowColor LightGreen } skinparam database { BackgroundColor black BackgroundColor << XML >> #800000 BackgroundColor << JSON >> #800000 BackgroundColor << MySQL >> #008000 BackgroundColor << Oracle >> #00A000 BackgroundColor << Postgres >> #00C000 bordercolor white ArrowColor LightGreen } skinparam package { BackgroundColor black bordercolor Red bordercolor<<PackgeRed>> Red bordercolor<<PackgeGreen>> Green bordercolor<<PackgeBlue>> Blue ArrowColor LightGreen } $end$

a Use Case ($UseCase$) as $UCPseudo$ $UCSRC$ --> $UCPseudo$ : $Description$ $end$
a DataBase database "$dbname$" << $proto$ >> as $dbpseudo$ $ucpseudo$ <.right.> $dbpseudo$ : $description$ $end$
a Message $msgSrc$ -> $msgDest$: $description$ $end$
an answer $msgSrc$ --> $msgDest$: $description$ $end$
an exchange $msgSrc$ -> $msgDest$: $msgdesc$ $msgDest$ --> $msgSrc$: $desc2$ $end$
an exchange with application control $msgSrc$ -> $msgDest$: $msgdesc$ alt $sucase$ $msgDest$ --> $msgSrc$: $desc2$ else Application Error 1 $msgDest$ -->x $msgSrc: $descError$ end $end$
an exchange with application and transport control $msgSrc$ -> $msgDest$: $msgdesc$ alt $sucase$ $msgDest$ --> $msgSrc$: $desc2$ else Application Error 1 $msgDest$ -->x $msgSrc: $descError$ else Transport Protocol Error (OSI) $msgDest$ -->x $msgSrc: $descError2$ end $end$
a loop loop #FF4000 on demande la clé 3 fois max avant de quitter $end$ end
un retard ... $end$ minutes later ...
un beautiy ||| $end$
Activate an actor activate $pseudo$ $end$
DeActivate an actor deactivate $pseudo$ $end$

agent agent $pseudo$ [ $label$ ]$end$
Agent artifact $pseudo$ [ $label$ ]$end$

database cloud "$label$" as $pseudo$ { $end$ }
file file "$label$" as $pseudo$ { $end$ }
folder folder "$label$" as $pseudo$ { $end$ }
frame frame "$label$" as $pseudo$ { $end$ }
node node "$label$" as $pseudo$ { $end$ }
package package "$label$" as $pseudo$ { $end$ }
rectangle rectangle "$label$" as $pseudo$ { $end$ }
storage storage $pseudo$ [ $label$ ] $end$
use case usecase $pseudo$ [ $label$ ] $end$
boundary boundary "$Name$" as $pseudo$ $end$
control control "$Name$" as $pseudo$ $end$
entity entity "$Name$" as $pseudo$ $end$
interface interface "$Name$" as $pseudo$ $end$
if if ($end$) then (true)
else (false)
endif
if ... elseif if ($end$) then (true)
elseif () then (true)
else (nothing)
endif

endwhile (empty)

endfork

end end $end$
